home.headline: Need a dopamine hit?
home.subhead: Tap the glowing play button and let Funopi pick your next distraction.
home.description: Funopi is a nostalgic portal of arcade-inspired curiosities curated to cure boredom on demand. Each press launches a safe, iframe-friendly mini experience hand-picked for classrooms, offices, and late-night scrollers. From <bold>Age Geek</bold> memories to interactive doodling pads and neon particle toys, the lineup refreshes constantly. Park your cursor on the molten play button, press it, and let random joy stream in.

about.title: Who we are
about.intro: Welcome to Funopi — every press takes you somewhere new!
about.body: Funopi is an experimental entertainment portal built on one simple rule: a single glowing play button unlocks a surprise website. We scout the web for curious, delightful, and even useful destinations, then deliver them at random so every visit feels fresh.
about.goal: Our goal is to become your launchpad for instant amusement and web discovery. We add hand-picked destinations every day so there’s always a new world waiting behind the button.
about.cta: Welcome to the Funopi universe — one tap, infinite worlds.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy — Funopi
privacy.intro: At Funopi we respect your privacy and keep the experience lightweight. Here’s the short version:

sections.heading: 1. Information we collect
points: No sign-up, no personal data required.
We may use cookies purely to improve site speed and performance.
Analytics tools such as Google Analytics help us understand usage trends without collecting personally identifiable information.

sections.heading: 2. How we use data
points: To refine the experience and keep it smooth.
We never sell or share data with third parties for commercial gain.

sections.heading: 3. External links
points: Funopi sends you to third-party websites. We aren’t responsible for their content or privacy practices, so please review their policies when you land there.

sections.heading: 4. Ads
points: We may display third-party ads (e.g., Google AdSense). They might use tracking technologies to serve relevant ads.

sections.heading: 5. Data protection
points: We follow recognized security practices to guard against abuse, intrusion, and misuse.

sections.heading: 6. Policy updates
points: We might update this policy occasionally. Any changes will appear on this page.

privacy.questions: Have questions or requests? Reach out via our Contact page.

contact.title: Contact Funopi
contact.intro: We’d love to hear from you. Share ideas, suggest new sites, or report hiccups—every note helps us keep the button magical.
contact.body: Whether you have a new website to recommend, feedback for the platform, or a technical issue to report, we’re ready.
contact.response: We respond as soon as possible.
